forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers. Partly sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. West wind 3 to 12 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 5am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. West wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
The morning in Downtown San Francisco unfurls under a sky marked by an intriguing dance of clouds, teetering between partly sunny and the possibility of scattered showers. The view offers hints of a stubborn marine layer attempting to retreat, yet the waters still shimmer beneath a gentle gray canopy. The air is cool, with a hint of briskness as a west wind stirs softly through the streets. As the day progresses, temperatures will settle near the mid-50s, nudging one to don layers for comfort.

With a mild chance of rain lingering through the day, it’s wise to carry a light jacket, perhaps even a compact umbrella. This can also be a perfect backdrop for a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, where the distant shimmer of the bay reflects the solemn beauty of the city—ideal for a quiet coffee in hand while indulging in the simplicity of watching life unfold. If the inclination strikes, stop by a local gallery to witness the artistic pulse of San Francisco or find a cozy nook in a flourishing café, where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee mingles with the sweet anticipation of afternoon rain.
